attributes.action: Stop the use of poisonous flouride in our water. Sodium fluoride is a poisonous neuron-toxin which is added to the drinking water supply. It has no benefit and contravenes the European convention on human rights & biomedicine,which sets out the criteria for medical intervention.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Water fluoridation is practiced in approximately 60 countries (360 million people).Sodium fluoride is a poisonous neuron-toxin which is added to the drinking water supply.There is NO benefit to human consumption of fluoride.Even the smallest amount causes brain & nerve damage.Fluoride causes multiple hormonal imbalances & induces early puberty,depression & ADD/ADHD.

These countries chose not to fluoridate :
Austria,Belgium,Denmark,Finland,France,Germany,Iceland,Italy
Luxembourg,Netherlands,Norway & Sweden.
Their children's teeth are just as good,if no better,than the teeth of children in fluoridated countries.
Fluoridation is unethical.
It contravenes the European convention on human rights & biomedicine,which sets out the criteria for medical intervention.Water fluoridation denies the right of the individuals to refuse or give consent to any medication involving their person.
